mapper.insert: insert into user (user_id, user_name, user_password, user_email, user_gender, user_birthday, avatar) values (#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userGender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userBirthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update user set user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_password = #{userPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_email = #{userEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_gender = #{userGender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_birthday = #{userBirthday,jdbcType=DATE}, avatar = #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select user_id, user_name, user_password, user_email, user_gender, user_birthday, avatar from user where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select user_id, user_name, user_password, user_email, user_gender, user_birthday, avatar from user
